name: Komit
slug: You will love your business apps!
tagline: We shape Business Applications based on Odoo since 2009.
description:
Komit is a team of Odoo experts. Komit's history is
    linked to Odoo since 2009. For more than 10 years, we shaped solutions based on
    Odoo for many customers, worldwide, in different sectors such as manufacturing,
    retail, hotel, administration or project management. We have experience in all
    core modules, like CRM, Sales, Purchase, Stock, Manufacturing, Accounting,
    Human Resources and have the ability to design completely custom modules.
